name: Anand Unifloor
overview:
Established in the year 1997, at New Delhi (India), we, “Anand Uniflooor Pvt. Ltd.,” are engaged in Distributing, Trading and Supplying a comprehensive range of Laminated Wooden Floorings 16x16 Inch, Laminated Wooden Floorings, Laminated Wooden Floorings 8 mm, Laminated Wooden Floorings 12 mm, Laminated Wooden Floorings, Artificial Grass, Solids Carpet Tiles, Avenue Carpet Tiles, Camry Carpet Tiles, Vertical Limits Carpet Tiles.

Our Quality Assurance: It is quality product range and precise, effective services, which make us a reputed organisation. We procure our products from a trusted vendor base, who use only quality raw material to manufacture the products.

Client Satisfaction: The main motto our our organization is the client satisfaction. To ensure the same, we have set our business policies keeping the same in mind. We have appointed highly skilled and trained professionals who supports us offer customized solution to our patrons.

Vendor Base: Throughout our industrial exposure, we have been dealing only with industry’s most trustworthy and reliable vendors. These vendors practice fair & transparent business practices and use only high grade raw material to manufacture their products.

Why Us?: We try and comprehend the specific demands of our customers prior to providing them solutions with the range of Products & Services available. Our Products& solutions are rendered in compliance with the global norms and standards taking into account clients requirements.
